definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: touch, reach, strike (NH id.; Ar. naja9a is agree with one (of food), produce effect ; Aram. [[נְגַע]] Ithpa. be struck (sc. w. leprosy), cf. Pi. infr.);—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of ´[[י]] touching earth, mountains, etc., sq. [[בְּ]] Am 9:5, Ps 104:32, Ps 144:5; fig. of ´[[י]] touching the heart, sq. [[בְּ]] 1Sa 10:26.
nearly = strike, pass. stricken, Ps 73:14, Is 53:4 ‖[[מֻכֶּה]]), of wind Job 1:19, Ez Eze 17:10; of divine chastisement 1Sa 6:9, Job 1:11, Job 19:21; sq. [[אֶל]] Job 2:5.

reach, extend to, 2Sa 5:8, sq. [[בְּ]] (but crpt. v. Dr HPS); in metaph., sq. [[עַד]], of vine Is 16:8 Je 48:32; of sword Je 4:10, cf. v:Je 4:18; of chastisement Mic 1:9, cf. Job 4:5 (‖[[בּוֹא אֶל־]]); also (sq. [[אֶל]]) Je 51:9; = come, sq. [[אֶל־]] Jon 3:6; arrive (of time), abs. Ezr 3:1, Ne 7:73.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּנׇּֽנְעוּ]] Jos 8:15 be stricken, defeated (in battle), i.e. feign to be so, but read prob. [[וַיִּנׇּֽגְפוּ]], v. [[נגף]]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[נִגְּעוֹ]] 2Ch 26:20 strike (with leprosy, 2 acc.), subj. ´[[י]]; so Impf. [[וַיְנַגַּע]] 2Ki 15:5; Ge 12:17 (subj. ´[[י]]; acc. of pers. + acc. of cogn.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִגִּיעַ]] Is 25:12 + 6 t.; 2 fs. [[הִגַּ֫עַתְּ]] Es 4:14; 1 s. sf. [[וְהִגַּעְתִּ֫יהוּ]] Ez Eze 13:14, etc.; Impf. [[יַגִּיעַ]] Is 8:8 + 3 t.; [[וַיַּגַּע]] Is 6:7, Je 1:9, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הַגִּיעַ]] Es 2:12, Es 2:15; Pt. [[מַגִּיעַ]] Ge 28:12 +; f. [[מַגַּ֫עַת]] 2Ch 3:11; —cause to touch; reach, approach, arrive:

cause to touch, apply, Ex 12:22) (JE; [[מִדָּם]], [[אֶל־]]); cause to touch (cf. [[עַד עָפָר]], [[לָאָרֶץ]]), i.e. bring to ground, Is 25:5, Is 25:12, cf. La 2:2, Ez Eze 13:14 (sq. [[אֶל־]]), Ex 4:25 (J; sq. [[לְרַגְלָיו]]); sq. [[עַל־פֶּה]] Is 6:7, Je 1:9; sq. [[בְּ]] Is 5:8.

intr. reach, extend, Ge 28:12 (sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc.); sq. [[אֶל־]] Zec 14:5, sq. [[עַד]] Is 8:8; cf. ´[[תַּגּ]] [[יׇדוֹ דֵּי שֶׂה]] Le 5:7 if his hand do not reach enough for a lamb (i.e. he be not able to furnish a lamb); sq. [[לְ]] Job 20:6 (hyperb.) 2Ch 3:11, 2Ch 3:11, 2Ch 3:12; sq. [[עַד לְ]] 2Ch 28:9; attain, sq. [[לְ]] Es 4:14, arrive, come, sq. acc. loc. Is 30:4, Es 4:3, Es 8:17, sq. [[לְ]] (of time) Da 12:12, sq. [[אֶל־]] 1Sa 14:9, sq. [[עַד־]] Ps 107:18, abs. Es 6:14; sq. [[אֵחֶל]] Da 8:7.
approach, of time, abs. Ec 12:1, Ct So 2:12, Ez Eze 7:12 (‖[[בּוֹא]]); v. also Es 9:1 (sq. Inf.), cf. Es 2:12, Es 2:15, Ps 88:4 (sq. [[לְ]]).
of fate or lot, = befal, sq. [[אֶל־]] Es 9:26, Ec 8:14, Ec 8:14, Ps 32:6.
